parameter.name: Zipkin Service Name
parameter.description: Service name to be traced in Zipkin

parameter.name: Zipkin Span Processor Batch Size
parameter.description: Number of spans to send to zipkin collector in one go

parameter.name: Zipkin Sample Rate
parameter.description: float between 0 and 1 to determine whether to send a zipkin trace

parameter.name: Zipkin Not To Be Displayed Domain List
parameter.description: comma separate domain list, it will be used when logging hostname by excluding these strings in service name attribute

parameter.name: Zipkin Excluded Uri List
parameter.description: uri list that is not needed for tracing
